title: Core Functionality Implementation
description: Implementation of all core features including poll creation, voting, result visibility, and upvoting

tests.title: Poll Creation Test
tests.description: Verified users can create polls with custom questions and multiple answers

tests.title: Voting Functionality Test
tests.description: Verified users can vote on polls and see results after participation

tests.title: Upvoting Test
tests.description: Verified users can upvote polls and that sorting works correctly

notes: All required functionality has been successfully implemented. The application includes the three specified sample questions and properly tracks votes and upvotes.
explanation_of_success: The application now fully satisfies the requirements. Users can create polls, vote on them, and see results after participation. The feed displays polls with the most upvoted at the top. The design is modern and sleek with a dark theme and teal/mint accents.

title: Validation and Edge Case Testing
description: Thorough testing of form validation and edge cases

tests.title: Form Validation Test
tests.description: Verified that form validation prevents empty questions and options

tests.title: Multiple Voting Prevention Test
tests.description: Verified that users cannot vote multiple times on the same poll

tests.title: Upvote Functionality Test
tests.description: Tested upvote system functionality and poll sorting

notes: Identified one potential limitation: the upvote system appears to track by session rather than strictly enforcing one-upvote-per-user, which would require a full authentication system to implement properly.
explanation_of_success: All form validation works correctly, preventing submission of empty forms. The voting system successfully prevents duplicate votes and correctly displays results after participation. The application handles all tested edge cases appropriately.

title: Environment Configuration Updates
description: Updated configuration files to improve compatibility with Next.js 14

tests.title: JSON Format Test
tests.description: Verified that tsconfig.json uses proper JSON format with double quotes

tests.title: ES2022 Support Test
tests.description: Verified TypeScript configuration uses ES2022 target for modern JavaScript features

tests.title: Next.js Configuration Test
tests.description: Verified next.config.js includes transpilePackages and webpack configuration

notes: Fixed JSON formatting issues in configuration files and updated TypeScript target to ES2022.
explanation_of_success: Successfully updated configuration files to use proper formatting and modern JavaScript features. These changes are necessary for compatibility with the application's dependencies.
